duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing preventive maintenance services on truck and trailer equipment with little or no supervision and in a timely manner.
Repairing and troubleshooting major components such as engines, transmissions, differentials, etc.
Keeping work area clean and safe and using Penske’s tools and technologies to log, research, and complete repairs.
Learning new skills through Penske’s technician training and working on other projects and tasks as assigned by supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred; vocational or technical certification in vehicle repair preferred. Valid driver’s license required, CDL preferred.
